message:
Hi Abhishek,

I hope this message finds you well! It's been a while since our paths crossed, and I thought it would be a great time to reconnect. I see you've made impressive strides at Amazon, progressing through various roles to become a Senior Applied Scientist. That's truly commendable!

Speaking of which, I remember our discussions about the fantastic opportunities at The University of Texas at Austin. It must have been quite an experience to transition from there to such a pivotal role at Amazon. I'd love to hear more about how your education helped shape your journey, especially in the field of applied sciences.

Also, I noticed your stint as a Research Assistant at VJTI. Working on research projects there must have been quite enriching. If you're available for a chat sometime, I'd love to catch up and learn more about your current projects and any exciting developments in the field.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best regards,
Andre
